title: The Red Gleam
description: Kathy is a young student, living in Dusseldorf, Germany. But behind the normal life, she is hiding her lust for blood. She knows that once the door to murder is opened, she won’t be able to close it again. But there is more lurking deep inside her…Kathy is happy with her new life and her new hobby, but when she falls in love her outlook on life changes. Can she stop hunting? Or is she already caught up too deeply?The perfect story for everybody who likes suspense and doesn't mind severe violence and sexual content!
author: Monique Pitzer
